column4: ok guys so these guides are saying boot from xp cd, run recovery console and do fdisk /mbr, but doesn't this make grub go away?
then grub is not in the MBR...perhaps in its own partition
so will fdisk /mbr fix my "a disk read error occurred" error when booting windows but it won't touch GRUB?
uhh it did in fact get rid of grub...
